amendment.description: To revise the multi-year strategy requirement regarding diplomatic engagement with Caribbean region governments.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5177 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5177 proposed by Senator Portman for Senator Corker. (consideration: CR S7128; text: CR S7128) To revise the multi-year strategy requirement regarding diplomatic engagement with Caribbean region governments.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5177 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5177 proposed by Senator Portman for Senator Corker.
